product_name: IGKTravel Size Good Behavior Spirulina Protein Smoothing Spray
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingIGK's Good Behavior Spirulina Protein Smoothing Spray with Spirulina Protein + Innovative Bonding Polymers. Heat-activated spray mimics the smoothing and anti-frizz results of a keratin treatment.
details: DetailsBenefitsKeratin-like treatment24-Hour frizz control450¬∞ F heat protectionKey IngredientsSpirulina Protein: Strengthens and nourishes hairInnovative Bonding Polymers: Mimics the frizz-free, high-shine coating of a keratin treatment when activated by heatFormulated WithoutGlutenParabensSulfatesMineral OilSiliconePEGsItem 2554763How To UseMist over damp hair in sections. Comb through, ensuring every strand is thoroughly coated from root to tip. Blow-dry in sections to seal in the treatment with heat. Style as usual or apply again and finish with a flat iron for maximum smoothing.WARNING: FLAMMABLE. CONTENTS UNDER PRESSURE.Avoid spraying near eyes. Protect from sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 120F. Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Keep away from heat/sparks/open flames/hot surfaces-no smoking. Do not spray on an open flame or other ignition source. Use only as directed. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents may be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children.IngredientsAlcohol Denat., Hydrofluorocarbon 152a, Butyl Ester of PVM/MA Copolymer, Vanillin, Fragrance (Parfum), PEG/PPG-17/18 Dimethicone, Water (Aqua/Eau), C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Hydrolyzed Corn Protein, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Silicone Quaternium-16, Undeceth-11, Phenoxyethanol, Cinnamidopropyltrimonium Chloride, PEG-12 Dimethicone, Glycerin, Spirulina Platensis Extract, Butyloctanol, Undeceth-5, Ethylhexylglycerin, Acetic Acid, Arctium Lappa Root ExtractShipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.This brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Mist over damp hair in sections. Comb through, ensuring every strand is thoroughly coated from root to tip. Blow-dry in sections to seal in the treatment with heat. Style as usual or apply again and finish with a flat iron for maximum smoothing.WARNING: FLAMMABLE. CONTENTS UNDER PRESSURE.Avoid spraying near eyes. Protect from sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 120F. Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Keep away from heat/sparks/open flames/hot surfaces-no smoking. Do not spray on an open flame or other ignition source. Use only as directed. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents may be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children.

reviews.headline: Never go without it!  Awesome stuff!
reviews.comments: Love this stuff!!!!

reviews.headline: A new staple!!
reviews.comments: I have a good bit of frizz after my hair is dried. And it is quite straight. This project helps tame the frizz and makes it shine and look so sleek.  Please never stop making this stuff!!

reviews.headline: Smells
reviews.comments: Gave it 3 stars bc I like the results but am I the only one who thinks this smells like cow manure?

reviews.headline: yes
reviews.comments: it all depends on how I do my hair if I wash and leave it it's a little bit wavy if I blow dried it straight

reviews.headline: Great spray before using a blowdryer and yummy smell!
reviews.comments: I brought this to the beach for a week's vacation and it worked wonders for my hair.  Smells great too!

reviews.headline: strong sent
reviews.comments: I hate the smell. It gives me bad headaches. I wish the scent was different.

reviews.headline: Not the best
reviews.comments: I had high hopes but it let me down. The smell, not great, heavy on the hair, felt like it left a coating on my hair, heaviness

reviews.headline: Smells foul
reviews.comments: This smells SO bad. It smells like a farm, like a county fair where the cows are on a hot day. It is absolutely vile. I don't even know if it works and will never know cause the smell is so so bad. Returned it.

reviews.headline: No lo compraria de nuevo
reviews.comments: Deja mi cabello peor lo deja pesado y con mucho frizz y como pegoso para mi terrible dinero votado .

reviews.headline: You need to open a window when using this product
reviews.comments: I like this heat protectant because it's designed to be used on dry hair, but omg the smell is horrible. It's not even that it smells bad as much as its like a dense fog that LINGERS. I hold my breath when I spray it and leave the room for a minute while it clears out. I will not repurchase or recommend for this reason alone. Otherwise it's a good product.

reviews.headline: Great product.
reviews.comments: This product is great except it has an awful smell.

reviews.headline: This product SAVED my hair
reviews.comments: My hair was super dead from straightening with no heat protectant EVERY day. Ever since I started using this heat protectant, my hair has not suffered damage, and had time to grow. It smells like cupcakes as well. Best heat protectant and I will die on that hill.

reviews.headline: This product is awesome! So glad my stylist used on my hair.
reviews.comments:
Softens hair and smells so good. Does tame
The frizz!

reviews.headline: Spot On!
reviews.comments: My hair is fine but abundant and catches all humidy in the air! My stylist recommended this product and I love it! I live in a coastal area so it is always a problem. The IGK does the trick! I've never been able to control the frizz until I tried this!

reviews.headline: Overall, great product!
reviews.comments:
I have thin, fine hair that gets frizzy in the slightest humidity. I have to be very careful with hair care products because majority of them make my hair very greasy even if I use the smallest amount. 

The only downside to this product, in my opinion, is the smell. If you are sensitive to scents, DO NOT buy this product. 

Personally, I will be buying this product again since it did not make my hair greasy at all. I used it as directed and my hair turned out extremely soft, shiny, and no frizz!

reviews.headline: I Started using Today
reviews.comments: I Just started using this Morning‚ù§Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏èüëç i have a Ton of hair Stuff products but I decided to spoil my self So i went to ulta spent 78 dollars worth of products and the beauty specializt recommended the Trio set with the protein spray which smells amazing!!! i cant wait to try the dry shampoo and the beach club when i do the curls i love it so far

reviews.headline: Overall good product
reviews.comments: Its a great product, seems to protect my hair from heat. I love that I can use it wet or dry. The scent is fantastic but for me it adds a bit too much texture/stiffness. I want more smooth, silky flexibility than texture.

reviews.headline: Why the bad reviews?
reviews.comments: I have wavy thin-medium hair, this product did a good job. I sprayed it before straightening my hair and it really helped with frizz and made my hair smooth and shiny. Maybe the bad reviews are people who havent been using the product right. It is heat activated; and dont spray directly on your roots. I was hesitant to try because of the reviews but Im glad I did.

reviews.headline: Great Heat Protectant
reviews.comments: I bought this on the suggestion of an Ulta Salon employee. It can be used on damp or dry hair which is great since I have thick hair that takes foreve to dry and I style it often. Immediately noticed a ton more shine and a lot less tangling. I got some many compliments on my hair. I loved that it did not weigh down my already heavy thick hair. Left it bouncy and shiny and helped skip a couple more months between trims. Downsides were the product can linger in the air so use in a ventilated area, leaves hands sticky even after washing and its a bit pricey, but I would still buy it. Completely worth my pennies especially since I have color treated hair and it helped go longer in between washes.

reviews.headline: Amazing for ethnic hair
reviews.comments: My hairdresser uses this on me and I had to snap a picture and buy it, its sooo good! I have ethnic hair and it performs amazing 5 stars

media.headline: I would definitely buy this product again!!
Best hair product ever!
media.caption:
There is no such thing as a bad hair day when using the @igkhair "Good Behavior" Spirulina Protein Smoothing Spray. This product really blew my mind! Getting my hair done every morning used to take a long time before using it and now it has cut down my blow-drying time significantly leaving my hair soft, shiny and most important frizz-free! It helps protect my hair from humidity, heat and UV damage which is extremely important when living in Sunny Scottsdale! Watch my stories so you can see how I use this product and swipe up to learn more! It is available at @ultabeauty üíï#igkpartner #igkhair . -

media.headline: This product is a life saver and just what I needed

faceoff_positive.comments: This is my new HG smoothing spray!!! If I blow dry my hair and style immediately (rarely happens) I don't have to worry too much about frizz but my hair holds a curl for days and the frizz just gets crazier as the days pass. Because of this, even when my hair has a nice curl, it never looks as good as the first day. I used this on days 2-4 after curling my hair and I am blown away!!! First, it got rid of the frizz in a way that no product ever has because it wasn't greasy or drying at all!!! It added a little bit of shine, but not so much that it looked wet. It also didn't leave any build up on my hair!! I didn't even realize I was on day 4 until I did the math because my hair still looked good and was nice and touchable! I usually wash my hair after day 3 because the frizz gets out of control! I'm so happy with this product, I will definitely be purchasing this from now on! The only downside is that the scent is so strong that I have to leave the room immediately after spraying it, but it does make my hair smell great all day long!
faceoff_positive.headline: My new HG smoothing spray!!

faceoff_negative.comments: The main ingredient is alcohol and it is way too harsh on my hair. First time I tried it I washed and conditioned with bars. I then let my hair air dry just a bit and sprayed the smoothing spray. OMG, I though I had a head full of split ends. Took blow drying and hot iron to get it under control. Still had to put smoothing serum in to get it to look better. Second time I washed and conditioned with Salon quality shampoo and conditioner, air dried a bit and used way more smoothing spray. Still had to use the hot tools and smoothing spray to get it to look close to smooth and shiny. My hair feels like I have a ton of product in it, but the final result looks okay.Just too drying for my hair.
faceoff_negative.headline: Too harsh
